summary: This is an email from September 13, 2019, in which an individual declines to attend a Monday interview with Epstein's long-time New York house manager. The purpose of the interview is stated as identifying other employees and gathering observations from the house.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: Referred to as the employer of the house manager who is the subject of the planned interview.

events.title: Planned Interview with Epstein's House Manager
events.description: A scheduled interview with Jeffrey Epstein's long-time New York house manager to identify other employees and gather information about activities at the house.

keyFacts: An interview with Jeffrey Epstein's long-time New York house manager was scheduled for a Monday in September 2019.
The primary purpose of the interview was to identify other employees who worked at Epstein's New York house.
A secondary purpose was to see what, if anything, the house manager observed at the residence.
The email sender declines to attend this interview due to a scheduling conflict with another case team.
